tweets.author: そがべしゅうじ(FiFS)(PERSPECT inc.)
tweets.text:
アイマスSideM 5周年の締めくくりに
FiFSで46人描き下ろしさせていただきました！
背景ありなしで微妙にキャラの仕上げ違うので
大きい絵で観せられる機会があると良いなー。
「プライドフルブルー」
色々使って頂いて本当にありがとうございました。

315なグッズも是非。
https://shop.asobistore.jp/feature/sidem5th_p/?utm_source=ec_top_banner&utm_medium=ec_toppage&utm_campaign=ectop_banner_side5thstage_event_goods…

thread_replies.author: そがべしゅうじ(FiFS)(PERSPECT inc.)
thread_replies.text:
絵のグッズはこっちのリンクでした！
https://shop.asobistore.jp/feature/sidem5th…

thread_replies.author: なおこ( 'ω' )
thread_replies.text:
@FiFS_nono 
今更ながら今回も46人描き下ろしありがとうございます！！！！
46人を描き下ろすだけでも本当に大変なのに全身絵だし他にも全体的にすごいし(語彙力)FiFS絵大好きだから描き下ろし絵ビックリしました
あまりに好きすぎてグッズいっぱい買いましたこれからもよろしくお願い致します！！

thread_replies.author: 多部タイナ*12/21A-6
thread_replies.text: お祭りライブで楽曲の貸し借りをすることと、よりにもよって私らがもう二度と与えてもらえないってキッパリ言われてる「ゲーム」という媒体で、よりにもよって語り尽くせないほどの理由で大切に大切にしている「プライドフルブルー」を使われてしまうことは、まったく別ですからね

thread_replies.author: あじさい
thread_replies.text:
I just want you to know.
I think every brand has songs or important things that they don't want covered by other agencies. I believe there are lines that absolutely must not be crossed.
Prideful Blue is that for every member of EmP who felt regretful during the 5th anniversary.

thread_replies.author: あじさい
thread_replies.text:
I don't get the meaning of implementing Prideful Blue. That's unforgivable, isn't it?
There are performers and idols who aren't wearing it, and because of that, everyone couldn't go 3D, and we couldn't even hold a commemorative live show. For a sideM producer, it's tied together

thread_replies.author: America's Plastic Makers
thread_replies.text:
With a little knowledge and effort, we can recycle more plastics – even while hosting a party. Here’s a quick set of tips on how to recycle plastics at your parties.

thread_replies.author: 犬飼真下
thread_replies.text:
Shani-song Proudful Blue
It's arranged in a way that even feels natural when worn by a woman, which is amazing
By the way, it seems like there's no star on the shoulder that Kasama-san loves so much (is it hidden?)
